Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.u5uPp2qYPln7aoOz]{Psiblade Proficiency} or @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.aa-rulebook.Item.M1Cbm2LJqmpzRAFq]{Plasma Blade Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.jViibXrHmQKko0gM]{Basic Defensive Form}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.IqlAGgpvfpZnCc2W]{Reaction Form Focus} or @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.gAJy77Uf1u1MAm8m]{Deflect Form Focus}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.XMcusmiFwpjpi36m]{Intermediate Defensive Form}, and @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.WR1aUMPFdye0K53C]{Reaction Form Expertise} or @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.oHkWwlRjTVC2GHGd]{Deflect Form Expertise}

Benefits

When any hostile creature moves adjacent to the character, the character immediately receives an Attack of Opportunity when wielding a psiblade or plasblade. This is limited to one attack per hostile creature. When fighting defensively with a psiblade or plasblade, there is no additional Combat Point cost and the attack penalty is reduced to -2. When wielding a psiblade or plasblade, the Combat Point cost to perform any reaction is reduced by 3
system.summary: Defensive fighting penalty reduction, -3 CP to react, AoO
